name: SendMeRadio
0:
”Alexa, start SendMe Radio”
”Alexa, play SendMe Radio”
”Alexa, ask SendMe Radio what is the current song”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: send me radio
des:
SendMe Radio is the sister company of SendMe Promotion we are a live-streaming radio station and podcast that promotes "The Good News". Listen to awesome interviews, powerful messages, and Gospel music. Listen to the stories of businesses and how they got started and be inspired. SendMe Radio streams live 24/7.
 We have educational and informative programs aimed at creating awareness about topics that will interest you, and be of many benefits. Join our global community and affect lives. We have daily Bible Studies and virtual prayer meetings. 
We also have programs that we specifically create in an effort to empower our community and stimulate positive outcomes in the lives of our listeners. Download our free app SendMe Radio for awesome interviews, Gospel music, and powerful messages. Listen to SendMe Radio on various streaming platforms: Apple and Google Podcast, Spotify, and Public Radio. Need a radio commercial to promote your business, Church, or social event? We can create your very own custom commercial and 
rotate it on our platform just email us at digitaink@sendmeradio.com Just Google SendMe Radio we are everywhere. Share us with your friends and family!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
